Package GTU_Board

Class AbstractBoard

java.lang.Object
GTU_Board.AbstractBoard
Direct Known Subclasses:
BoardArray1D, BoardArray2D
public abstract class AbstractBoard
extends java.lang.Object
This abstract class represents the board configuration.

      index_j - x axis of the board.
      value - the new value of the cell.

    • setColumnNumber

      protected void setColumnNumber​(int newColumNumber)
      arranges the column number also there is error check. size can't be smaller than 3x3
      Parameters:
      newColumNumber - The new Column number.

    • setRowNumber

      newRowNumber - The new row number.

      public abstract void setsize​(int newrow, int newcolumn)
      Sets the board size to given values. The board is reset after this operation.
      Parameters:
      newrow - The new value of row.
      newcolumn - The new values of column.

    • equals

      public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object other)
      compares the content of the cells donesn't consider last move or number of steps.
      Overrides:
      equals in class java.lang.Object

      Returns:

    • isit_ValidSequence

      public static boolean isit_ValidSequence​(AbstractBoard[] Sequence)
      checks whether the array is a valid sequence of moves for a solution. also considers the last moves. doesn't consider the number of moves.
      Parameters:
      Sequence - The array which will be checked.
      Returns:
      returns true if the array contains a valid sequence of moves for a solutions
